message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

I appreciate your time, Alice. I've done my research and I believe the product is worth $600,000 to me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $650,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is significantly higher than your valuation. I can come down to $900,000. This is a very competitive price for a product of this caliber.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I still think $900,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm proposing $700,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
